title: Challenge 1: LED
description: Write the code to blink an LED:
codeSolution:
import machine

led_pin = machine.Pin(5, machine.Pin.OUT)  # Replace '5' with the appropriate GPIO pin number

while True:
    led_pin.value(1)
    machine.sleep_ms(500)
    led_pin.value(0)
    machine.sleep_ms(500)
